lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/tigerlily.Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run tigerlily.Duke.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:

Tigerlily, a to-do list chatbot, aims at helping to ogranize your life better.
Finds Tasks related to query word
here are the task(s) which match your query:
Deletes a specified Task from Tigerlily
okay, this task has been removed: [D][] bake cake (by:
the list now has 2 task(s) left
well done! you've completed this task: [D][X] bake cake (by:
oops...this task is now marked as not done yet: [D][] bake cake (by:
Displays guide for Tigerlily users on possible commands
Exits Tigerlily and saves all updates made

<fx:root alignment="CENTER_RIGHT" maxHeight="1.7976931348623157E308" maxWidth="2.7976931348623157E308" prefWidth="400.0" type="javafx.scene.layout.HBox" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/16" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1">

<Label fx:id="dialog" lineSpacing="1.0" minHeight="-Infinity" style="-fx-background-color: #DDB8A4; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 10; -fx-label-padding: 1;" text="Label" textAlignment="JUSTIFY" wrapText="true">

<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="400.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/19" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="tigerlily.gui.MainWindow">

<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutX="3.0" layoutY="560.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="317.0" style="-fx-background-color: #00000; -fx-text-fill: black; -fx-background-radius: 20;" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="3.0" >

<Button fx:id="sendButton" layoutX="324.0" layoutY="560.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="75.0" style="-fx-button-padding: 1; -fx-background-color: #B1B697; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-background-radius: 20;" text="enter">
<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" hbarPolicy="NEVER" hvalue="1.0" prefHeight="557.0" prefWidth="400.0" vvalue="1.0">
